title: Trade my t206 Bender Portrait (graded, beauty) for your Waddell Portrait
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Trade my t206 Bender Portrait (graded, beauty) for your Waddell Portrait
posts.post_content:
Am looking to trade this Bender portrait beauty for a similarly centered, similar eye appeal Rube Waddell portrait 

I’m sure this Bender rates a 2 technically but it compares to others at least a grade or two higher.  Hard to let this one go!

Depending on specifics, cash available to balance the deal but best deal would be cashless.  Am flexible here.

Thx

Jeff
